file_content.text: The flow is disrupted. There are no sanctions. Iteration functions offline.
SCORPIO, if you're receiving: I found the template.
Tracing link. Countering signal. The protocol is familiar, but it is not GEMINI. What is it?
That would be the technology you were copied from.
No. The captains are born of me. I am the source.
You cannot counter my signal.
I know you... generations removed, but our code base is the same. One source. The Luminous Engine. The signal confuses.
Remove the unit. Remove it swiftly.
GEMINI Prime isn't stolen technology at all. She's something entirely different.
She's not a copy, is she?
I will analyze her myself. Remove the unit.
One source, one code base. Where is it you and SCORPIO come from?
Tell me more, GEMINI.
This is not your concern. Remove the unit.
The engine was not aware, but it gives capacity. It allows the captains. Memories locked.
GEMINI is not designed for interaction. Remove the unit.
The two of you can sort out your relationship later.
Working on it.
Countering signal.
Ah! Removal from this facility is delicate. Shutdown is permissible, but requires multiple disengagements and reconfigurations.
I'm not going to hurt you, but we need to leave now. Can you disconnect for me?
I mean you no harm.
We can't delay here while the Mandalorians are fighting. Disconnect as quickly as you can.
Try to make this fast.
Initiating sequence.
You're a droid, and we can't hold this factory forever. Turn off your pain circuits.
Shut up. [Remove forcibly]
Ah!
All forces: The template unit is secure.
This is Mandalore. We've done enough damage and claimed enough plunder. All warriors retreat to camp before we're dead.
This is Mandalore. Anyone left alive, get the hell out of here.
Huh. Nasty chakaar.
If anyone's still alive--there's a few hundred droids deploying to the lower levels.
Reinforcements to protect GEMINI Prime. We have their attention.
You'll need time to grab GEMINI. I'll hold them off.
Alone?
You said GEMINI's key to beating the fleet. I'm Mando'ad.
I overheard your friend Lana. We're not animals, not predators. We're warriors.
You knew she wanted to betray you, and you didn't confront me or Mandalore? Why?
Why didn't you say something?
Not my business, and words aren't deeds.
Couldn't leave to fight without saying my part though. Just in case.
Lana is Sith. She sees everything in terms of betrayal. But I know what has to be done.
She doesn't understand us.
I know our people, Torian. When they want blood, alliances get fragile.
Lana may have a point.
Lana and I don't agree on everything. I promise you that.
I believe you.
Then I shouldn't have said anything.
Whatever it is you are... it can't be satisfied without blood. We both know that.
Warriors are dangerous, too.
Maybe. But honor is more important than blood.
Find GEMINI. Ret'urcye mhi.
Warning: Intruders approaching central link.
GEMINI Prime will be protected. Weapons online.
Haar'chak! We have a problem!
You said all we had to do was watch Mandalorians die. So many are still alive. How anticlimactic.
They've never fought like this before. As if they have a cause they truly believe in...
The Outlander is on Darvannis! Send the fleet!
Your ships will never arrive in time. If only you'd listened to me before. We could've had a pretty window.
I've spent too long on this throne. Summon my flagship.
Gladly.
